content: Jerusalem, Holy City of the Future
Again the word of the  of hosts came, saying,
But now I  not  the remnant of this people as in the former days,’ says the  of hosts.
Then the word of the  of hosts came to me, saying,
“Thus says the  of hosts: ‘In those days ten men from every language of the nations shall grasp the sleeve of a Jewish man, saying, “Let us go with you, for we have heard  God  with you.” ’ ”
